title: The Last Seed
description: Orantine is the best spy in her faction, the one they go to for impossible missions. But her next target is like nothing she has faced before, a high ranking official in a faction whose members can see the future.Orantine has never failed before, but this time, she isn’t sure success is possible.Armed with her faction’s genetic mutation, and the latest technology the world has to offer. Orantine believes she has found the perfect plan.Nothing comes without a price, however, and this mission will push her to the edge, and further.How far will she go to ensure success? And how far is she willing to go to prove she is the greatest in her world?
author: Moud Adel
